version_description:
We changed the Icon!
Squashed some bugs.
Bug Fixes
Bug fixes and improvements
◉ Fixed a bug where portrait videos didn't save correctly

◉ Minor UI improvements
◉ Faster seeking in video

If you have any problems please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

◉ Fix bug where playback didn't loop back to start

If you have any problems please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

◉ Fix bug where playback didn't loop back to start

If you have any problems please let me know at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Updated for iPhone X
• Speed video up to 4x
• Slow video down to 0.1x
• Minor Bug Fixes

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Bug Fixes
• Updated for iPhone X
• Speed video up to 4x • Slow video down to 0.1x • Minor Bug Fixes

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fix issue where sometimes video saved as black

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fix issue where sometimes saved video played as slo-mo in the middle
• New settings screen

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fix issue where phone might sleep in the middle of saving a long video and cause it to fail

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Fixed a bunch of issues that could cause your video to fail to save
• Fixed issue where the video might play when you went to the save screen

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Added a video trimmer so you can trim your video after selecting it.

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• Small UI tweak to video trimmer

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com

• You can adjust the range of the speed adjustment for better accuracy

Recently:

• Support 10x speed up as well as 10x slow down
• Add multiple music to video
• Add voice recording to video
• Added a bunch of filters
• You can now adjust brightness, contrast, exposure etc

If you have any issues please email me at support@honkhonkpunch.com
